description: mob does not take fall damage
mob does not take suffocation damage
bees with this tag will not poison anything they sting
A fireball with this tag will pass through entities that also have this tag
An entity with this tag will not take damage from any evoker fangs
A entity that dies with this tag will kill all other entities that it is riding or riding it
An arrow with this tag will be removed once it hits the ground
An arrow with this tag will remove a mob's (not the player) invincibility ticks after it hits
An arrow with this tag will remove an entity's (including the player's) invincibility ticks after it hits
